resources.string: Are you sure want to erase the whole canvas?\nYou can\'t undo this action later.

Having Question?
How to control this application?üòï

Don't worry one tutorial is available on how to control this application.

Select your choice accordingly.

Follow the tutorial step by step to use the application without any problem , still you face any problem just put a request on the review section , we will update out tutorial soon.\n\n Best wishes ‚ù§.
1.Click on Drawing to save only drawing.
Are you sure want remove the background image?\nYou can\'t undo this action later.
2.Click on the frame to save the whole frame with background if present.
